scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation

Class LabelHeatMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation.LabelHeatMap

  • public class LabelHeatMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The script class to decorate an input PNG file with plot labels and save as an SVG.
    Code sourced from https://github.com/WilliamKMLai/jHeatmapLabel
    (Dated March 15, 2021)
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    LabelHeatMapCLI, LabelHeatMapOutput, LabelHeatMapWindow

    • Constructor Detail

      • LabelHeatMap

        public LabelHeatMap(java.io.File iNPUT,
                    java.io.File oUTPUT,
                    java.awt.Color cOLOR,
                    java.lang.Integer bORDERWIDTH,
                    java.lang.Integer xTICKHEIGHT,
                    java.lang.Integer fONTSIZE,
                    java.lang.String xLEFTLABEL,
                    java.lang.String xMIDLABEL,
                    java.lang.String xRIGHTLABEL,
                    java.lang.String xLABEL,
                    java.lang.String yLABEL,
                    java.io.PrintStream out_win_ps)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    OptionException
        Initialize labeling parameters in this constructor
        Parameters:
        iNPUT - the PNG input to format the labels and outline around
        oUTPUT - the filepath for the SVG-formatted labeled PNG
        cOLOR - the color of all the lines and text annotating the PNG
        bORDERWIDTH - the thickness of the line outlining the PNG
        xTICKHEIGHT - the length (in pixels) of the tickmarks on the x-axis (no tickmarks on y-axis)
        fONTSIZE - the size of all text labels on the annotated SVG
        xLEFTLABEL - the text label for the far left tickmark on the x-axis
        xMIDLABEL - the text label for the midpoint tickmark on the x-axis
        xRIGHTLABEL - the text label for the far right tickmark on the x-axis
        xLABEL - the text label for the x-axis
        yLABEL - the text label for the y-axis
        out_win_ps - the destination to output progress update and input information as the script executes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        OptionException

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public java.lang.Integer run()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Execute building SVG labels around the input PNG.
        Returns:
        0 upon succesful execution
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
